Thulsa invaded this region because the Croskurn Mines are rich with mana ore—the same used to power the shields of Allemantheia.

We can surmise that Thulsa is planning an attack on a scale the federation may not survive."Can he be stopped?"

Those who would see our demise will see it soon enough if we lose faith.

First and foremost, retrieve the mana ore gathered by the legion...before it reaches Thulsa.

Congratulations!

It's safe to say you stalled Thulsa’s plan.
Please, get that ore before it becomes fuel for Thulsa's fury.
